name: places/ChIJXeO4A6f3wokR1LPClbgLgnI
formattedAddress: 45 W 132nd St, New York, NY 10037, USA
adrFormatAddress: 45 W 132nd St, New York, NY 10037-3101, USA

originalText.text: I first noticed Lindi's photography from a friend of mine she photographed. I was blown away by her work and reached out asking who the photographer was. A few weeks later, I was in Lindi's studio and had the best time working with her to capture a new look for me as a filmmaker. Despite coming from an acting background and spending years in front of the camera, having your headshot is a completely different thing. Lindi immediately made me feel comfortable and it felt like a true collaboration, two artists hanging out, talking, and having fun. I was relaxed and as a result can say that Lindi's work truly captured the qualities I see in myself that I'd love to project into the world. Lindi is an artist, a collaborator, and truly gifted at what she does. I can't wait to have my next photos taken with her.

originalText.text: Highly recommended! Lindi was wonderful to work with. She made the process collaborative and fun, and I felt very comfortable even as someone who's never worked with a professional photographer before. I ended up with a beautiful image for an important milestone in my career, and I am thrilled with the result.

text.text: Highly recommended! Lindi was wonderful to work with. She made the process collaborative and fun, and I felt very comfortable even as someone who's never worked with a professional photographer before. I ended up with a beautiful image for an important milestone in my career, and I am thrilled with the result.

originalText.text: I was referred to Lindi by my agent for new headshots and after checking out her website I was immediately impressed by her work. I am a veteran of the fashion/entertainment/acting industry and shooting with Lindi was an absolute pleasure. She’s a true artist and is so incredibly skilled at both photo composition as well as controlling the light to get just the perfect balance for your specific skin tones.  She also goes above and beyond to make sure you are 100% happy with what she has shot so you leave knowing you’ve gotten the perfect shot or shots.  I just can’t say enough great stuff about Lindi. And she’s also just cool and fun to work with. Would highly recommend her to anyone!

originalText.text: Working with Lindi was a rewarding experience. She’s nice and professional and creates a great atmosphere to make you feel comfortable and confident. I appreciate how much she listened to what I was looking for and was able to deliver that exactly, while combining my ideas with her knowledge and abilities. Great communication before, during and after shooting. Would definitely recommend and work with her again!

I appreciate how much she listened to what I was looking for and was able to deliver that exactly, while combining my ideas with her knowledge and abilities. Great communication before, during and after shooting. Would definitely recommend and work with her again!

originalText.text: Lindi is creative and so fun to work with. She spent time before the session to help me narrow down what my expectations and desired shots were. She is very collaborative on the day and goes above and beyond to get you your shot! Quick turn around with images and amazing communication :)
